name: The Fallen (Inspiration Version)
description:
You are eko a small creature that is on a quest to find the stars after they went into the abyss. Can you find the stars in the maze that the abyss is?

How to play:

Use the arrow keys to move side to side!

Controller support should be there but has not been tested yet.

The actual version is coming soon (or might be out) this version inspired it tho!

 

Made with the godot game engine!

MADE FOR A WINDOWS DEVICE
